spec_data.Name: pl-jpl
spec_data.License: (BSD and (GPLv2+ with exceptions or Artistic 2.0)) and (GPL+ or Artistic) and (BSD or GPL) and LGPLv2+ and TCL and UCD and MIT and BSD and Public Domain
spec_data.Description:
JPL is a library using the SWI-Prolog foreign interface and the Java Native
Interface providing a bidirectional interface between Java and Prolog
that can be used to embed Prolog in Java as well as for embedding Java
in Prolog. In both setups it provides a re-entrant bidirectional interface.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Wed 08 Nov 2017 08:33:17 AM EST, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A bidirectional Prolog/Java interface for SWI Prolog
